turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to order four pizza at Belaluna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For one of the pizzas, I want them to be a Meat Lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the second one, I wanted it to be a chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the third one, I want it to be a veggie lover's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the fourth one, I want it to be pepperoni and ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what size did you want these in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want them all to be medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you are ordering 4 medium pizzas, one meat lovers, one chicken bbq, one veggie lovers, and one pepperoni and ham, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I have all of them extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they charge extra for additional cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $80, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That'd be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you.
